name: Aymen Jebri
background: Aymen Jebri is a Senior Software Engineer with over 15 years of experience in software development and consulting, primarily in the automotive and aerospace industries. He has a strong background in designing, implementing, and integrating diagnostic features for automotive systems, particularly for BMW and Renault. Aymen has worked extensively with Agile methodologies and various technical environments, including C/C++, UDS standards, and diagnostic tools. He holds an Engineer's degree from the National School of Computer Science of Tunis and is certified as a SAFe 5 Agilist and Professional Scrum Master I.
potential_questions: Can you describe your experience with UDS standards in automotive diagnostics?
How do you approach integration testing in complex software systems?
What strategies do you use to ensure traceability of requirements in your projects?
Can you give an example of a challenging problem you solved in your previous roles?
How do you prioritize tasks when working in an Agile environment?
